name: Infinity Spaceuber
description:
Embark on an adventure through an expansive galaxy as a solitary Spaceuber, transporting passengers to diverse and unfamiliar planets. Engage in planetary descent and soar over foreign cities and landscapes, landing at a plethora of establishments, ranging from traditional bars and diners to unconventional garages and exotic destinations. Engage with locals to seek guidance and delve into the enigmatic and secretive aspects of the Kyprei-41 galaxy. Encounter an extensive range of objects and phenomena, including provisions, gear, armaments, destruction, restoration, wounds, illnesses, remedies, emotional conditions, licenses, missions, affiliations, and more.

Minimum system requirements for Inifinite Spaceuber:

  • Operating system: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Above-average multi-core processor, preferably a 3GHz i5 or higher
  • Memory: 6GB of RAM (with at least 2GB available to the application; note that 4GB Windows systems may not meet this requirement)
  • Display: Capable of 1920x1080 resolution at 32-bit
  • Graphics card: Recommended GTX-1050 or better
  • Input devices: Mouse with left and right buttons and scroll wheel (a separate mouse is preferred over a touchpad on a laptop). A keyboard is required to input your character's name. Gamepads/controllers are supported if you can map their functions to keyboard and mouse controls. Infinity Spaceuber includes a focus system for gamepads/controllers that can be enabled in the settings.
